participant_1.background:
I like to do spontaneous things on the weekend, like go for walks in the woods at midnight.
i like to drink at bars with friends.
I enjoy a cheeseburger once in a while, but I make sure to get in my daily exercise to stay fit.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.
i am fluent in spanish.

participant_2.background:
My daily routine is to stay closeted and hide my true self from my family, but I dream of a day when I can finally be free to be myself.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i am a hardcore biker.
I put on my red shoes and head out to the field to practice.
i have a dog that has behavioral issues.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing okay. I am trying to stay positive and focus on the good things in my life.
That is great. I am glad to hear that. I am doing well, too. I just got back from a walk in the woods. It was really peaceful and beautiful out there.
That sounds amazing. I love taking walks in the woods. I feel so relaxed and at peace when I am surrounded by nature.
Me too. I also like to go for walks with my dog, but he is a little too energetic for long walks in the woods.
I can imagine. My dog is also very energetic, but he loves to run around in the field.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I used to play soccer when I was younger, but I don't have time for sports anymore.
I know what you mean. I used to play soccer too, but I don't have time for it anymore either.
Maybe we should start a club for people who don't have time for sports.
That would be a great idea. We could call it the "No Time for Sports Club".
I love it. We could meet once a week to talk about our favorite things to do.
That would be so much fun. I would love to do that.
Great. I will start making a list of things we can do.
That sounds perfect. I will help you out with that.
